dict.acceptation: 容易地；很可能；迅速地；频繁地；

sent.orig: Parallel computers can easily be built but can't be easily programmed.
sent.trans: 并行计算机制造简单，为其编制程序却大为不易。

sent.orig: Does dry skin suntans easily or wet suntan easily?
sent.trans: 干的皮肤容易晒黑还是湿的皮肤容易晒黑？

sent.orig: He was easily bored, too easily, and dull people always put him out.
sent.trans: 他很容易厌烦，非常容易，那些冥顽不灵的人总使他受不了。

sent.orig: Books printer printed on paper are easily easily shared and resold by anyone.
sent.trans: 打印在纸上的书容易共享和转卖。

sent.orig: She would easily be mystified, easily crushed.
sent.trans: 她很容易受到蒙蔽，受到摧残。
